SELECT PRODUCT_NO ,PRODUCT_NAME ,FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME TITLEIMG ,CATEGORY_NAME ,PARENT_CATEGORY_NO FROM PRODUCTS P JOIN CATEGORY C USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN PRODUCTS_ATTACHMENT PA USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY P.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_NO ,CATEGORY_NO ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRODUCT_PRICE ,FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME TITLEIMG FROM PRODUCTS P JOIN CATEGORY C USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN PRODUCTS_ATTACHMENT PA USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND P.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY P.COUNT DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_NO ,CATEGORY_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRODUCT_PRICE ,FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME TITLEIMG FROM PRODUCTS P JOIN CATEGORY C USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN PRODUCTS_ATTACHMENT PA USING (PRODUCT_NO) JOIN REVIEW R USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND P.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY R.COUNT DESC
